column4: if i create an .sh file to install something on a computer, and then copy that command to an other computer, will it run all the same without differencies?
that's not a given, depends on what's in the .sh file. Many times it will work though
it's iffy. especially if it has dependencies.
if you're installing on a very similar system, then more likely it will work. You have to trust the source, though -- and since it's auto-downloading, trust where it's hosted
